sys_ui_message.key: External domain urls should not be configured as "inline" or "modal" as they might not be viewable due to security restrictions. Please choose option "new window" for such end points.
sys_ui_message.message: Зовнішні URL-адреси домену не слід налаштовувати як "inline" або "modal", оскільки вони можуть бути невидимими з міркувань безпеки. Виберіть "new window" для кінцевих точок.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: External domain urls should not be configured as "inline" or "modal" as they might not be viewable due to security restrictions. Please choose option "new window" for such end points.
